bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with qi ye 氣噎①

a) , qi induced gullet occlusion. SWBJQYBMJ Lj: 治產後衝脹，胸中有物狀，是噎氣，不降，紫金丹 , “For treating surging [qi] and distension following delivery, with a feeling as if there were an object in the chest, this is gullet occlusion qi which fails to descend, [use] purple-gold-elixir”.

② Illness Sign identical with qi ye 氣噎② , qi[-induced] gullet occlusion. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：雞嗉，噎氣不通，燒研，入木香，沉香、丁 香、紅棗丸服 , “For gullet occlusion qi failing to pass on, roast chicken crop and grind it, add mu xiang , chen xiang , ding xiang , and hong zao , and ingest as pills”.
